name: michael-zakaryan
description: - backend is simple node js app serve as a proxy - you need to run `yarn start`

scripts.bootstrap: concurrently -n "DB-server,auth-service,restaurant-service" "foxx server set toptal http://localhost:8529/ --database toptal" "cd auth_foxx && foxx install --server toptal --database toptal /auth" "cd restaurant_foxx && foxx install --server toptal --database toptal /restaurant"
scripts.compose:all: concurrently -n "db, backend,frontend," "/usr/local/Cellar/arangodb/3.6.2_1/sbin/arangod -c $HOME/Library/ArangoDB-etc/arangod.conf --http.trusted-origin '*'" "cd backend && yarn start" "cd frontend && yarn start"
